name: SaltyHome
0:
”Alexa, Salty Home”
”Alexa, ask Salty Home how is my water softener doing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: salty home
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Never forget to add salt to your water softener!
Salty lets you view detailed insights on how your water softener is doing, all from the comfort of your couch.
Buy: meetsalty.com
